titleStmt.title: A method proposed for the regulating the coin which will certainly prevent its exportation, hinder its being melted down, and bring forth hoards of mill'd and broad mony, increase the exportation of the manufactories and productions of England, and raise a considerable sum towards carrying on the war, and consequently very much inrich the nation.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmiths' Library, University of London.
